quest.name: Corporeal Comforts
journal:
Does Stigma-4 dream of electric Miw Miisv? These are the questions you ask of your imagination.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to the nurturing nanny.
objectives: Mine [Error] at the Elysian playgrounds.Deliver [Error] to the nurturing nanny.Gather [Error] at the Elysian playgrounds.Catch [Error] at the Elysian playgrounds.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Correspondence from Ea received. In adherence to updated nurturing protocols, acquisition and delivery of materials deemed “comfy” by organic life-forms has been requested.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Analyzing available resources... <meep> Viable material identified. Projections indicate 99.9842% compatibility with the tender epidermis of infantile Miw Miisv.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Imparting mission objectives: obtain appropriate amounts of clay from the recreational areas in Elysion and deliver it to the abode of the Ea, where a nanny awaits.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Imparting mission objectives: obtain appropriate quantities of softwood from the recreational areas in Elysion and deliver it to the abode of the Ea, where a nanny awaits.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Imparting mission objectives: obtain coral from the recreational areas in Elysion and deliver it to the abode of the Ea, where a nanny awaits. A share of proceeds from the sale of gold salmon roe will be donated to further Miw Miisv nourishment.

dialogue.name: EA04627
dialogue.text: You must be the fleshy one I ordered. Did you come complete with useful pieces?

dialogue.name: EA04627
dialogue.text: Yes, yes...precisely what I had in mind! The corporeal frames of our children are ever so delicate, so I thought soft and natural environs might better attend to their physical needs.

dialogue.name: EA04627
dialogue.text: I would have gathered the required materials myself, but lacking a body makes such labor quite impossible. Providing for progeny by the sweat of one's brow... Such is a life we can but barely remember. Anyway, I hope you will lend us your brow again sometime.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Return of Forename confirmed. Requesting additional information.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Verbal analysis complete. Satisfied nanny confirmed. Mission success.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: The true nature of the Miw Miisv continues to elude comprehensive analysis. Satisfactory periods of stasis unattainable. Diverting Last Dregs resources to data acquisition protocols... Recommending Forename strengthen herhis own data acquisition protocols, regardless of relative insignificance.
